title: LEADER OF NAVA SIHALA URUMAYA, SARATH MANAMENDRA ARRESTED
content: Sarath Manamendra, leader of the Nava Sihala Urumaya, has been arrested over a complaint lodged by a three-wheel driver at the Welikada police. Police said that Manamendra was being questioned over an incident, where he had allegedly made threats with the use of a pistol….
